question: Which of the following statement is/are correct about PMFBY(Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY). 1. PMFBY was launched in the year 2015. 2. It originated after rolling back of NAIS and MNAIS. 3. The premium for horticultural crops will be 5%.
explanation: PMFBY is the government sponsored crop insurance scheme that integrates multiple stakeholders on a single platform. The premium would be 5% kharif crops,1.5 % for rabi crops and horticultural crops will be 5%.
